mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PPALDAK_USERS (USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NM, USER_GENDER, USER_PH, USER_BIRTH) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{ph})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as "id", USER_PWD as "pwd", USER_NM as "name", USER_GENDER as "gender", USER_BIRTH as "birth", USER_PH as "ph" FROM TB_PPALDAK_USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PPALDAK_USERS SET USER_PWD = #{pwd}, USER_NM = #{name}, USER_GENDER = #{gender}, USER_PH = #{ph}, USER_BIRTH = #{birth}, WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
